alert.note: Alert for Delta; Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:46PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Delta and southeastern Menominee Counties through 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/... At 346 PM EDT/246 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles east of Powers to 8 miles northwest of Cedar River to Stephenson. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cedar River and Escanaba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
